newsitem.title: GREECE: soccer-AEK TO FACE PARIS ST GERMAIN IN CUP WINNERS' CUP.
newsitem.headline: soccer-AEK TO FACE PARIS ST GERMAIN IN CUP WINNERS' CUP.

text.p: Greece's AEK (Athletic Union of Constantinople) soccer club will face France's Paris St Germain soccer club in the European Cup Winners's Cup quarter finals.
The first game will be played at Berci stadium in Paris on March 6 and the second leg on March 20 at New Philadelphia.

Paris St Germain is considered one of the favourites to win the trophy and the Greek club was expected to have a hard task to reach the semi-finals. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
